section: The Purpose of the Venture will be determined by the Managers.
explanation: This statement is ambiguous because it doesn't specify how the Managers will determine the Purpose of the Venture or what happens if the Managers cannot agree. It gives the Managers complete discretion without any defined process or limitations.

section: Each of the Members has contributed to the capital of the Venture, in cash or property in agreed upon value, as follows (the "Capital Contribution"): Member Contribution Description Agreed Value BorrowMoney.com, inc To be determined USD JVLS, LLC dba Vaccines 2Go $60,000.00 USD From Monthly Government , City And State, And Or Private Awarded Contracts. Plus (10%) Of Any Generated Gross Revenue, In Add i t i on to The To ta l Contributions. $3,500,000.00 USD
explanation: There are inconsistencies in the description of JVLS, LLC's contribution and its agreed value. It states that JVLS is contributing $60,000 from contracts plus 10% of gross revenue, but then lists the agreed value as $3,500,000. This is a discrepancy because the description doesn't match the stated value, making it unclear what JVLS, LLC is actually contributing.

section: In the absence of a written agreement setting a value, the value of the Venture will be determined in a manner deemed appropriate by the remaining members. A withdrawing Member's interest will be determined at the discretion of the remaining members.
explanation: This clause gives the remaining members too much discretion in determining the value of the Venture and a withdrawing member's interest. This could lead to unfair valuation and potential disputes, as there are no objective standards or guidelines provided.
